title: OLAF Installer Implementation
description: Complete implementation of self-contained OLAF framework installer with GitHub Pages deployment

backlog.title: Backlog
backlog.description: Tasks to be planned and prioritized

cards.title: Dev Environment & Local Testing Setup
cards.description: Confirm Go toolchain works and define a safe local testing approach
subtasks: Run: go env GOPATH GOROOT GOOS GOARCH
Agree on standard local commands: go fmt ./..., go test ./..., go vet ./..., go build .
Pick a safe test strategy (temp dir / dry-run) so tests never touch real ~/.olaf
acceptance_criteria: go version succeeds and reports >= 1.21
go test ./... runs (even if no tests yet, it exits 0)
A written test strategy exists to avoid modifying real ~/.olaf

cards.title: Project Skeleton & Embed Wiring
cards.description: Set up Go module/project layout and wire embed FS
subtasks: Create assets/ structure (assets/olaf, assets/github, assets/kiro, assets/windsurf)
Add a minimal main() that prints help/version
acceptance_criteria: go build succeeds
Binary can read embedded assets (walk/list succeeds)
VERSION is embedded and printed by a command

cards.title: Install to ~/.olaf (Fresh Install)
cards.description: Implement fresh installation of embedded .olaf to ~/.olaf
acceptance_criteria: When ~/.olaf does not exist, running the program creates it
Installed tree contains required paths: core/skills, competencies, reference, reference/.condensed
Installer never writes .github/.kiro/.windsurf under ~/.olaf

cards.title: Update ~/.olaf (Incremental Update)
cards.description: Update an existing ~/.olaf by copying only missing/changed files
subtasks: Detect installed state via required paths
Walk embedded assets/olaf and update missing/changed files
Preserve user content under data/ (do not delete)
acceptance_criteria: Second run performs an update path rather than re-install
Only missing/changed files are written
No deletion of user files (especially under data/)

cards.title: Copy repo config (olaf-* files) to local repo
cards.description: Copy embedded olaf-* files into local .github/.kiro/.windsurf
acceptance_criteria: Only files matching prefix olaf- are copied
Target directories are created if missing
No writes occur under ~/.olaf for these files

cards.title: CLI Surface (help/version/--collection)
cards.description: Define commands and implement argument parsing
acceptance_criteria: Running with unknown args prints help and exits non-zero
help output documents all supported commands
version output is deterministic and includes GOOS/GOARCH

cards.title: File update decision (mtime + optional checksum)
cards.description: Decide whether an embedded file should overwrite an installed file
acceptance_criteria: If dest missing => update=true
If embedded newer => update=true
If installed newer => update=false
Debug mode explains the decision per file

cards.title: Check GitHub Releases for newer olaf binary
cards.description: Notify user when a newer release exists
subtasks: Offline/HTTP failure does not block install
acceptance_criteria: When online and newer exists, user sees a single clear message with download URL
When offline, install continues without error
No crash on unexpected API response

cards.title: CI build matrix + checksums
cards.description: Build platform binaries in GitHub Actions and generate checksums
subtasks: Include amd64/386/arm64 (+ arm GOARM where needed)
acceptance_criteria: All expected binaries are produced
checksums.txt is produced
Artifacts are downloadable from CI

cards.title: GitHub Pages site (static files)
cards.description: Add docs/ with a minimal install page
acceptance_criteria: Static page renders locally (file open) and in GitHub Pages
Copy buttons work
Links point to correct repo

cards.title: One-line install scripts (install.ps1 / install.sh)
cards.description: Scripts download the right release binary and run it
acceptance_criteria: Scripts select the correct asset name for current platform
Scripts fail with a clear error if download URL not found
Scripts execute the downloaded olaf binary

cards.title: Asset preparation script
cards.description: Prepare assets/ folder content consistently for embedding
subtasks: Script copies olaf-* from .github/.kiro/.windsurf into assets/
acceptance_criteria: Running the script produces the same assets layout every time
No accidental copy of repo root into assets
VERSION exists and is embedded

cards.title: Unit tests (core path safety + copy rules)
cards.description: Add unit tests for the most failure-prone logic
subtasks: Test: repo copy only copies olaf-*
Test: installer never targets ~/.olaf for repo dirs
acceptance_criteria: go test ./... includes these tests
Tests create temp dirs only and do not touch real home
At least one failing test is demonstrated and then fixed during implementation

cards.title: Manual smoke tests (local)
cards.description: Verify install/update behavior using a safe temp HOME strategy
acceptance_criteria: Smoke tests are documented and repeatable
All checks pass using temp dirs
No writes occur outside the temp test area

workflow.notes: Large cards were split into smaller similarly-scoped deliverables; 005a/005b can be done in parallel with core Go work.
